text: The 2008 Giro d'Italia Femminile, or Giro Donne, was the 19th running of the Giro d'Italia Femminile, one of the premier events of the women's road cycling calendar. It was held over nine stages from 5–13 July 2008. ==Route and stages== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stage results |- !Stage !Date !Course !Distance !Winner !Team |- ! style="text-align:center"| P | style="text- align:center;"| 5 July | Mantova to Mantova | style="text-align:center;"| | |Team Flexpoint |- !
